Name: Orion: The Eternal Punishment
About the game: Orion was a gifted giant in the art of hunting that got the love of his worshipped Artemis. His enemies, jealous, started plotting against him and killed him. After his death, Artemis, pleaded to the constellations to turn her loved into one of them; they accepted but there was a condition, Orion shall hunt each and every corrupted star touched by the darkness of the void. Fight the void creatures Use your automatic crossbow and your blunderbuss. Get and use different gadgets Chain different abilities to be extremely effective in combat and mobility. Enter into this universe in the pure modern retro style inspired by the great shooters!
